chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
items.plainText: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

items.text: Dominion and fear are with him, he maketh peace in his high places.
items.plainText: Dominion and fear are with him, he maketh peace in his high places.

items.text: Is there any number of his armies? and upon whom doth not his light arise?
items.plainText: Is there any number of his armies? and upon whom doth not his light arise?

items.text: How then can man be justified with God? or how can he be clean that is born of a woman?
items.plainText: How then can man be justified with God? or how can he be clean that is born of a woman?

items.text: Behold even to the moon, and it shineth not; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.
items.plainText: Behold even to the moon, and it shineth not; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.

items.text: How much less man, that is a worm? and the son of man, which is a worm?
items.plainText: How much less man, that is a worm? and the son of man, which is a worm?
